about.label: ABOUT US
about.title: Welcome to Camp Menina
about.description: Experience wellness in the heart of nature. Our retreat offers yoga, ice bathing, and healthy cuisine in a serene alpine setting.

meta.title: Wellness Services - Yoga, Ice Bathing & Workshops
meta.description: Discover our wellness services including yoga sessions, ice bathing experiences, workshops, and wellness packages at Healthy Corner retreat in Slovenia.
meta.keywords: wellness services, yoga, ice bathing, workshops, retreat, Slovenia, healthy corner, camp menina

meta.title: Weekly Schedule - Book Your Wellness Sessions

schedule.description: View our weekly schedule and book your wellness sessions in real-time
schedule.instructions: Click on any available time slot to book your session

bookingInfo.title: Booking Information
bookingInfo.point1: Bookings are confirmed instantly upon successful payment
bookingInfo.point2: You will receive a confirmation email with all details
bookingInfo.point3: Please arrive 10 minutes before your scheduled session

cancellationPolicy.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellationPolicy.point1: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before the session
cancellationPolicy.point3: No refund for no-shows or same-day cancellations
